definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
quarter (hour)/moment/to carve/to engrave/to cut/oppressive/classifier for short time intervals

sentences.english: At once she changed into a crane and opening her beautiful wings, she flew up into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 阿姿即刻變成了一隻鶴，張開漂亮的翅膀飛向天空。

sentences.english: The club members were immediately apprised of his change of plans.
sentences.chinese: 俱樂部成員們即刻被告知了其計劃的變更。

sentences.english: Can you remember off the top of your head the number of servings for each food group?
sentences.chinese: 你能即刻想起每組食物的份數嗎？

sentences.english: Conclusion The victim died suddenly after a person being untied because the cerebral e…
sentences.chinese: 結論受害者鬆綁後即死主要是腦水腫即刻加重的結果。

sentences.english: Should you have any questions please let us know.
sentences.chinese: 我們等待您的即刻答覆。

sentences.english: The F.A.O. has suggested several measures to deal immediately with the situation.
sentences.chinese: O提出了幾項即刻應對現狀的措施。

sentences.english: Once we found an appropriate person, we will close the message at once.
sentences.chinese: 一旦我們找到合適的人選，我們會即刻關閉此帖。

sentences.english: Take a seat please, Councillor Jones will see you in a moment.
sentences.chinese: 請稍坐，瓊斯政務委員即刻就見你。

sentences.english: He gives twice that gives in a trice.
sentences.chinese: 即刻就給予，即是給兩次。

sentences.english: It is said, under the clothing this medicine, can instantly ascend to heaven becomes an immortal.
sentences.chinese: 據說，服下此藥，能即刻昇天成仙。

sentences.english: So now, suddenly, uAB there's going to be some interaction energy.  uAB.
sentences.chinese: 現在，即刻，會有一些相互作用能。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical nursing gist of immediate implanting of ITI implant.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討ITI種植體即刻種植的臨牀護理要點。

sentences.english: Instantly fix photo flaws in just a click or two.
sentences.chinese: 即刻固定照片缺陷在公正的一個拍答聲或貳。

sentences.english: He'll telephne me the instant he knows.
sentences.chinese: 他一得到消息會即刻電告我的。

sentences.english: Social media will suddenly stop being a source of misery, it will become something truly useful.
sentences.chinese: 社交媒體在即刻解決這種痛苦上，變得真實有效。

sentences.english: But savoring those moment-to-moment pleasures is only half of the equation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，品味即刻的喜悅進做到了一半。

definition: at top speed/at a tremendous lick
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
the matter should not be delayed/there's no time to lose
at any time/at all times/at the right time
in the first moments (of sth happening)/immediately (after an event)/first thing
in a little while/in a moment/later on
must/to need to/to be sure to
